content: 14 14 14 b the colour to be used should be twisted 6th sizes only 11th row k14 14 14 15 15 15 b k1 round the colour just used to link the work 4 3 2 2 2 row working 1 st less in 1 1 0 0 0 a * p1a k1a repeat from * to end colours together and avoid holes do not double moss-st and 1 st more in st-st in 12th row * p1a k1a repeat from * to last break off and join in except where necessary each row 15 15 15 17 17 17 sts p0 0 0 1 1 1 a work 1 row working 2 sts less in double p15 15 15 16 16 16 b back moss-st and 2 sts more in st-st 13th row k16 17 17 18 18 18 b p1 0 0 using 5½mm needles thumb method and a repeat last 5 4 3 3 3 row 9 12 17 21 22 1 1 1 a * k1a p1a repeat from * to end cast on 81 89 97 103 111 117 sts times more 14th row * k1a p1a repeat from * to last 17 1st row * k1 p1 repeat from * to last st k1 19 19 19 19 19 sts k0 1 1 0 0 0 a 2nd row p1 * k1 p1 repeat from * to end for 3rd size only p17 18 18 19 19 19 b 1st and 2nd row set 1x1 rib work 3 row working 1 st less in double 15th row k19 19 19 20 20 20 b k0 0 0 work 4 row more in 1x1 rib ** moss-st and 1 st more in st-st in each row 1 1 1 a * p1a k1a repeat from * to end change to 6½mm needles and proceed as work 1 row working 2 sts less in double 16th row * p1a k1a repeat from * to last follows - moss-st and 2 sts more in st-st 21 21 21 23 23 23 sts p1 1 0 1 1 1 a 1st row * p1a k1a repeat from * to last work 2 row working 1 st less in double p20 20 21 22 22 22 b 3 sts p1a k2b from 1st to 16th row sets position of st-st in moss-st and 1 st more in st-st in each row 2nd row p3b * p1a k1a repeat from * to end b and double moss-st in a work 1 row working 2 sts less in double 3rd row * k1a p1a repeat from * to last keeping continuity of st-st in b and double moss-st and 2 sts more in st-st 5 sts k1a k4b moss-st in a proceed as follows - repeat last 7 row 7 times more 4th row p5 5 5 6 6 6 b p0 0 0 1 1 1 a * k1a p1a repeat from * to end for 2nd size only
